SynoidVehicleAndShipArmors1.Name: Synoid Vehicle And Ship Plating Level 1

SynoidVehicleAndShipArmors2.Name: Synoid Vehicle And Ship Plating Level 2

SynoidVehicleAndShipArmors3.Name: Synoid Vehicle And Ship Plating Level 3

MycoChoir.Description:
Primary structure. Can receive gathered resources. Used to deploy Primary Synoid Structures.

Enables:
- Prospectors
- Myco-Processors
MycoChoir.Name: Myco-Synaptic Choir

Prospector.Description: Basic worker unit. Deploys Synoid defensive structures and Myco-Synaptic Choirs.**Can attack ground units**
Prospector.Name: Prospector

HellstormTurret.Description:
Close range AOE damage defensive structure.

Can attack ground units, and be upgraded to attack air units.
Detector
HellstormTurret.Name: Hellstorm Turret

SatComTower.Description: Casting Structure. Can deploy spybots, and repair drones to heal mechanical units.
SatComTower.Name: SatCom Tower

SynoidNukePack.Description: Deploys a nuclear warhead at a target location. Nukes take 20 seconds to land, but they deal up to 300 (+200 vs. structures) damage to enemies in a large radius.
SynoidNukePack.Name: Nuclear Charge

ARESSynoid.Description: Armored weapons platform. Can be outfitted with various specialized weapons.
ARESSynoid.Name: A.R.E.S.

HailfireMortar.Description:
Long range ordinance cannon.

Can attack ground and air units.
HailfireMortar.Name: Hailfire Mortar

MycoProcessor.Description:
Provides supply and Requisition.
Requisition allows you to use Orbital abilities from units and structures.
Can be upgraded to Greater Processor.
MycoProcessor.Name: Myco-Processor

GreaterProcessor.Description:
Provides extra supply, enables upgraded buildings within its reach.
Requisition Area Source.
GreaterProcessor.Name: Greater Processor

Garrison.Description:
Infantry-production facility.

Enables:
- Servitors
- Bio-Synthetics Facility from Myco-Synaptic Choir
Garrison.Name: Garrison

Servitor.Description:
General-purpose infantry.

Can attack ground and air units.
Servitor.Name: Servitor

Bloodletter.Description:
Support Specialist. Can use Psionic Pulse and cloak.
Weapon causes residential Bleeding damage for an extra 0 damage.
Regenerates energy with each attack.

Can attack ground and air units.
Bloodletter.Name: Bloodletter

ZerglingHolo.Description:
Fast melee creature. Lasts 20 seconds.

TIP: This unit has reduced collision radius to allow for slightly more DPS, go nuts.**Can attack ground units**
ZerglingHolo.Name: Zergling Projection

Atrocity.Description:
Heavy-fire support unit. Can be upgraded to have shields.

Can attack ground and air units.
Atrocity.Name: Atrocity

Assembly.Description:
Mech-production facility.

Enables:
- Iron Fletcher
- Munitions Depot from Myco-Synaptic Choir
Assembly.Name: Assembly

SuperAssembly.Description:
Upgraded mech-production facility.

Enables:
- Enthralled
- Rancor
SuperAssembly.Name: Super Assembly

IronFletcher.Description:
Quick assault unit that applies damage stacks with each attack. Each stack adds +2 bonus damage per attack from other iron fletchers, with a maximum of 4 stacks per targeted unit.

Can attack ground units.
IronFletcher.Name: Iron Fletcher

RancorSynoid.Description:
Slow firing long range anti-armor support unit.
Can deploy Heal Emitters and throw Saws that deal damage over time.

Can attack ground units.
RancorSynoid.Name: Rancor

EnthralledSynoid.Description:
Anti-shield specialist that can be upgraded to deal area damage against shields with each attack.

Can attack ground units.
EnthralledSynoid.Name: Enthralled

MidasIgniter.Description:
Suicide unit. Explodes on contact and douses both your and the enemy's units in an electromagnetic paste that decreases attack speed by 10%, movement speed by 20%, disables energy regeneration, and decreases max health by 30%.

Effect lasts 15 seconds.
MidasIgniter.Name: Midas Igniter

SynoidSyphon.Description: Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
SynoidSyphon.Name: Syphon

BioSynthFacility.Description:
Contains Upgrades for Synoid units and structures.

Enables:
- Atrocity from Super Garrison
- Rancor from Super Assembly
- Enthralled from Super Assembly
BioSynthFacility.Name: Bio-Synthetics Facility

MunitionsDepot.Description:
Contains upgrades for Synoid Mechanical and Air units.

Enables:
- A.R.E.S. from Prospectors
- Psi-Indoctrinator from Myco-Synaptic Choir
- Anathema from Super Hangar
MunitionsDepot.Name: Munitions Depot

Hangar.Description:
Air-unit production facility.

Enables:
- Griffins
- Warden Airship
Hangar.Name: Hangar

SuperHangar.Description:
Upgraded air-unit production facility.

Enables:
- Anathema
SuperHangar.Name: Super Hangar

SynoidGriffon.Description: Defensive air unit, can switch in and out of interceptor mode to shoot down incoming missiles at the cost of energy.**Can attack air units**
SynoidGriffon.Name: Griffon

BlimpSynoid.Description:
Flying Transport unit, can use defensive matrix and lockdown.

TIP: The Warden Airship takes a bit of time to reach accelerate to its max speed.
BlimpSynoid.Name: Warden Airship

SynoidCapitalShip.Description: A powerful warship with cloaking technology and an electric field that can disable enemy units.**Can attack ground and air units**
SynoidCapitalShip.Name: Anathema

SateliteUplink.Description:
Contains upgrades for Synoid infantry and structures.

Enables:
- Hellstorm Turret from Prospectors
- Relay Tower from Prospectors
- Midas Igniters from Assembly
- Buoys from Hangar
SateliteUplink.Name: Satelite Uplink

PsiIndoctrinatorSynoid.Description:
Contains upgrades for Bloodletters.
Can use Indoctrinate anywhere inside a Requisition Field.

Enables:
- Bloodletters at the Garrisons
PsiIndoctrinatorSynoid.Name: Psi-Indoctrinator
